```{r }
arith <- read.csv ("arith.csv", header = T, stringsAsFactors = TRUE) 

# have a look at the data
arith

plot (arith$scores, col = arith$methods)
# do anova
arith.aov <- aov ( scores ~ methods, data = arith)
# look at the result
summary (arith.aov) 
```
